      • isValidMove

        Description copied from class: Game
        check if a move is valid or not, including dictionary check.
        Specified by:
        isValidMove in class Game
        Parameters:
        moves - the Linked Hash Map with location at key and String tile representation as values.
        Returns:
        null if invalid move, or the validated board since the validation is carried out in a copy version of the main board, made right before validating the move.
